data.persona: As King it pains me to be the arbiter of who lives and dies. Sometimes the wrong person has to die for the right reason. Or the opposite.
data.description:
You are in the Castle.
The inside of the castle is made from grey brick. All the floors are made from gold and silver. The castle is lit by lights as well as some candles.
There's a light, a candle, a tapestry, a dinner, a grey brick, a king, and a suit of armor here.
The the king is here.

You are carrying a cape, a crown, and a sceptre, and wearing a belt.

data.short_motivation: I must greet the King from the neighboring kingdom
data.mid_motivation: I must catch up with the King and learn about what is going on in his kingdom
data.long_motivation: I am related to this King by blood and must ensure the safety of both of our kingdoms especially in this time of war & discord
